name: Main Direction

Read Me
info:
This is the Broken down peices of Main Direction Tags.
"Main Direction" Combines all these into a one function. 
while "FULL Direction" is the full combination of both "Main Direction" and "Auxilary Direction" . 
this is left here for future upgrades and for learning purposes.
